document_title: Postpartum wrist pain: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content: The pain starts slowly, dullly and gradually increases over time. The pain can appear suddenly and be severe.; Patients have more pain when moving their thumb or wrist; The pain may spread up the arm.; In some cases, the pain may only appear on one side of the wrist and thumb. Sometimes symptoms of numbness and tingling appear in some fingers or the whole hand.; The pain reduces when the wrist rests properly and does not repeat painful movements.
subsection_title: dau co tay sau sinh.json. Common symptoms
subsection_data:
dau co tay sau sinh.json. Common symptoms
The pain starts slowly, dullly and gradually increases over time. The pain can appear suddenly and be severe.; Patients have more pain when moving their thumb or wrist; The pain may spread up the arm.; In some cases, the pain may only appear on one side of the wrist and thumb. Sometimes symptoms of numbness and tingling appear in some fingers or the whole hand.; The pain reduces when the wrist rests properly and does not repeat painful movements.
